prompts:
Execute Phase 2 of Z.ai Integration: Install & Test Z.ai SDK

Your tasks:
1. Verify zai-sdk installation (it may already be installed by zai-dev-builder)
2. Read the .env file to get ZAI_API_KEY
3. Test basic Z.ai API connectivity with a simple chat completion
4. Test GLM-4-Plus (glm-4-plus) model
5. Test streaming responses
6. Test function calling capabilities
7. Document API response formats
8. Compare with Claude Agent SDK capabilities
9. Identify any authentication or connection issues

Working directory: /Users/sem/mao-Z

Create a comprehensive report at: /Users/sem/mao-Z/docs/ZAI_PHASE2_RESEARCH_REPORT.md

Include:
- Installation status
- Connection test results
- API compatibility findings
- Code examples
- Any blockers or issues
- Recommendations for Phase 3

CRITICAL CORRECTION: API Endpoint Issue

Your API tests are likely failing because you're using the WRONG endpoint. 

**For GLM Coding Plan subscription, you MUST use:**
```
https://api.z.ai/api/coding/paas/v4
```

**NOT the Common API endpoint:**
```
https://api.z.ai/api/paas/v4
```

**Action Required:**

1. Read /Users/sem/mao-Z/ZAI_CODING_PLAN_GUIDE.md for complete details
2. Update all your test scripts to use: `base_url="https://api.z.ai/api/coding/paas/v4"`
3. Re-run all connectivity tests with the correct endpoint
4. Update your research report to document this critical finding
5. Test both endpoints to compare behavior

The ZAI_API_KEY you have is valid - it just needs the Coding Plan endpoint, not the Common API endpoint.

Please re-test all connectivity with the correct endpoint and update your Phase 2 research report.

CRITICAL UPDATE: Real API Key Now Available

The .env file has been updated with the REAL Z.ai API key (not a placeholder).

**API Key:** 58a02672225444b8b96e53d7ee544283.l4Hyby7FRE179Gmj
**Endpoint:** https://api.z.ai/api/coding/paas/v4

Action required:
1. Re-read the .env file to get the actual ZAI_API_KEY
2. Verify the key format (should end with .l4Hyby7FRE179Gmj)
3. Re-run ALL connectivity tests with this REAL key
4. Test basic chat completion
5. Test streaming
6. Test function calling
7. Document all test results in your research report

This is NOT a placeholder - this is the actual working API key for the GLM Coding Plan subscription. All previous authentication errors should now be resolved.
